backend/main.mo: Backend actor managing applications, user profiles, Stripe config, and access control with submission and admin-only queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature mapping file listing implemented features, related source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style text containing short descriptive summaries for all frontend files.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, apply, FAQs, and payment result pages.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page wrapper rendering header, footer, and route content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with competition info, navigation links, mission message, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky header with logo and responsive navigation highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching authenticated or anonymous backend actors with access control initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateCheckoutSess: Mutation hook creating Stripe checkout sessions through the backend and validating returned session data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and status tracking. Wraps AuthClient creation with custom options and exposes identity state to consumers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for checking Stripe configuration and finalizing applications. Submits completed applications using the authenticated actor and invalidates relevant queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS base styles and defines a color palette with light and dark themes. Applies global background styling, fonts, and layout adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by mounting App within React Query and Internet Identity providers. Loads global CSS and initializes QueryClient.
frontend/src/pages/ApplyPage.tsx: Implements the application form with authentication checks, form validation, video upload or YouTube link handling, and Stripe checkout initiation. Stores a draft in sessionStorage before redirecting to payment.
frontend/src/pages/FaqsPage.tsx: Renders an FAQ section with accordion components covering competition details. Uses styled cards and typography to present information.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage hero and feature sections promoting the music competition. Provides navigation to the application page and highlights event features.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment cancellation message with guidance and options to retry or return home. Informs the user that their application draft was preserved.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Processes Stripe payment confirmation, finalizes the stored application draft, and displays processing, success, or error states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom typography, colors, shadows, animations, and plugins for the project's design system.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature descriptions, requirements, and asset needs for the music competition website.
